tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE assistive_technology_usage (
    student_id INT,
    tool_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE AssistiveTechnologyToolUsage (
    student_id INT,
    tool_name VARCHAR(255),
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_duration TIME,
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id, tool_name)
);

CREATE TABLE StudentDisabilityInfo (
    student_id INT,
    disability_type VARCHAR(50),
    enrollment_date DATE,
    counselor_name VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE tool_usage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT NOT NULL,
  tool_id INT NOT NULL,
  usage_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES assistive_technology_tools(tool_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StudentAssistiveTools (
  student_id INT,
  tool_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tool_id) REFERENCES AssistiveToolInventory(tool_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES AssistiveToolCategories(category_id)
);
